New Records: Mohammed Haris made a remarkable debut with three sixes in 11 balls for 28 runs
Shadab Khan hit four sixes and scored 52, one of his best international performances
Key Match Events: Shadab Khan bowled the decisive over to remove key South African batsmen
Mohammed Wasim and Naseem Shah's death bowling prevented South Africa from chasing the target
Mohammed Haris's impactful debut shifted the momentum
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan captain Babar Azam expressed hope for the team's World Cup chances after the win
The match was a crucial moment in Pakistan's campaign
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam praised Mohammed Haris and the team's performance despite early struggles
South Africa captain Temba Bavuma expressed disappointment and called for improvement
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was affected by a rain delay
Pakistan's win kept their hopes alive with remaining matches against Bangladesh and Netherlands
